name: Star Collector (jasonlee12)
description:
The number of players: 2 - 4+

brief description:  

Star Collector plays a matching card game between students who begin studying astronomy at the school. Each team begins with memorizing the exact name and pair of cards showing half of the picture of each star constellation. When one team has earned seven points, they will win the game. 

link: https://playingcards.io/jngd86
